mapper.sql: t.id, t.task_id, t.job_id, t.desc, t.executor_address, t.type, t.param, t.exec_strategy, t.route_strategy, t.exec_timeout, t.retry_times, t.retry_times_limit, t.trigger_time, t.trigger_code, t.handle_time, t.handle_code, t.logPath
mapper.select: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(trigger_time,'%Y-%m-%d') `day`, COUNT(handle_code) dayCount, SUM(CASE WHEN (trigger_code in (0, 200) and handle_code = 0) then 1 else 0 end) as runningCount, SUM(CASE WHEN handle_code = 200 then 1 else 0 end) as sucCount FROM task_log WHERE trigger_time BETWEEN #{from} and #{to} GROUP BY `day` ORDER BY `day`
SELECT id FROM `task_log` WHERE !( (trigger_code in (0, 200) and handle_code = 0) OR (handle_code = 200) ) ORDER BY id ASC
